data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Atoms will always have equal numbers of protons and electrons, so their overall charge is zero. Atoms ____ neutral. Ions, on ____ other ____, ____ atoms ____ have ____ or ____ electrons ____ now ____ an ____ number ____ protons ____ electrons. If ____ are ____ electrons, the ____ will ____ negatively ____. If there are missing electrons, the ion will be positively charged, due to the majority of positive protons.
data.partBlankContent: Atoms will always have equal numbers of protons and electrons, so their overall charge is zero. Atoms a__ neutral. Ions, on t__ other ha__, a__ atoms th__ have gai___ or lo__ electrons a__ now ha__ an une____ number o_ protons a__ electrons. If th___ are ex___ electrons, the i__ will b_ negatively cha____. If there are missing electrons, the ion will be positively charged, due to the majority of positive protons.
data.answer: 原子的质子数和电子数总是相等的，所以它们的总电荷是零。原子是中性的。另一方面，离子是一种获得或失去电子的原子，现在拥有不相等数量的质子和电子。如果有多余的电子，离子就会带负电荷。如果缺少电子，离子就会带正电，因为大多数质子都是带正电的。
